blogDetails.body_markdown:
## Pages
- About
 - Skills
 - Career
 - Education
- Articles
 - Blog posts
- Open-source
 -  open-source repositories list 
- Projects

## Built with
- Front-end library - [Reactjs](https://reactjs.org/)
- UI components - [Chakra UI](https://chakra-ui.com)
- Icons - [react icons](https://react-icons.github.io/react-icons/)

**Demo Link:** [Portfolio](https://ma-ahmad.github.io/portfolio2)
**GitHub Repo:** [Repo](https://github.com/MA-Ahmad/portfolio2)

---

## Updated Portfolio website

![Portfolio website 2](https://dev-to-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/articles/dfmll4sk34qa2iled9po.png)

## Pages
- Home Page
 - Intro
 - Highlights
  - Achievements
 - Projects
- Achievements
 - Show progress yearly wise
- About
 - Career
 - Education
- Open-source
 - open-source repositories list (card design)
- Blog
 - Published articles list 


**Demo Link:** [Portfolio](https://mahmad.me/)
**GitHub Repo:** [Repo](https://github.com/MA-Ahmad/portfolio)


## Update
##### [Open-source page](https://mahmad.me/#/open-source)
* Used github rest api to fetch user repositories
* Updated page design with react-stack-grid
* Used skeleton to show loading
